title: The equivalence of two theorems of integer programming
abstract: Two theorems concerned with integer programming analogues of linear programming duality are shown to be equivalent. The more recent theorem has a clear geometric interpretation, which is explained
publisher: Oxford University Press on behalf of the London Mathematical Society
